EmailTemplate.name: APJ_Event_SG_Cloud Native Seminar_Q316.01 Send Invite_0804
EmailTemplate.subject: CLOUD NATIVE SEMINAR WITH JOSH LONG : 19 August 2016, Friday @ Suntec Singapore
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
19 August 2016 8:30 AM - 4:00 PM
Suntec Singapore Convention & Exhibition Centre
Level 3, MR304
1 Raffles Boulevard
Suntec City, Singapore 039593
REGISTER <[[https://pivotal.io/event/cloud-native-seminar/singapore?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=sg-workshop-q316]]>
Over the course of the day, you will learn about the Pivotal Cloud Foundry platform, building microservices with Spring Boot, architecting for resilience with Spring Cloud, and integrating analytics with Spring Cloud Data Flow. You will see first-hand how the platform and application framework come together to boost developers' productivity by streamlining the workflow so they can focus on adding value. Come and see how Pivotal Cloud Foundry and Spring Boot can be brought together to create a continuous delivery pipeline and learn about the power of Spring Cloud to build microservice architectures and data analytics.
Register Now <[[https://pivotal.io/event/cloud-native-seminar/singapore?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=sg-workshop-q316]]> for this exclusive event as space is limited.
Prerequisites:
- You MUST be an experienced Java user. - Please remember to bring your laptop and get ready to do some intense coding.
Questions? Please contact us via email <[[mailto:jtan@pivotal.io]]> or visit our website <[[https://pivotal.io/event/cloud-native-seminar/singapore?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=sg-workshop-q316]]>.
